      • getCurrentUsername

        public java.lang.String getCurrentUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Gets the username to be used for the current session. If the passed in username is empty, returns the user currently stored in the application's security context (from the token)
        Parameters:
        username - the username to check
        Returns:
        the current user to be used
